name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a reward for the former Chief Prosecutor of the Jiang'an District People's Procuratorate of Wuhan City, surnamed Huang, appeared on the streets of Wuhan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Learned

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of April 15, at Beijing Linhe Yueyuan, a group of people blocked the entrance of the community for unknown reasons. When the man's car drove to the entrance of the community, a woman fell in front of the car, and then someone claimed that the man had hit someone.
The man asked for help from the property management, but the property management said they couldn't do anything. After the police arrived, they persuaded him for more than ten minutes to no avail. The people around him began to accuse the man of hitting someone and not getting out of the car and surrounded the car.
Finally, the police persuaded the man to apologize to the crowd

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 16, Yibin, Sichuan. A car hit a student crossing a zebra crossing.
The police reported that the accident caused one death and one injury, and the perpetrator has been controlled.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 15, Taizhou, Jiangsu. A woman reported the Gaogang Branch of the Taizhou Public Security Bureau in her real name.
The woman said that in November 2022, the Gaogang Branch listed her as a suspect in the data destruction case of her ex-husband's computer information system, and forcibly searched and seized 290 bitcoins from her wallet.
On April 10, 2024, the Gaogang Branch of Taizhou withdrew the case against her, but refused to return the seized bitcoins.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 16, Guangzhou residents spontaneously shared the current situation of traffic police checking vehicles on the mini program

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 16, in Zigong, Sichuan, citizens said that taxi drivers and illegal taxi drivers have been fighting each other in recent days.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 14, Zhengzhou, Henan Province, two drunk men molested a 10-year-old girl at the entrance of Longhu Commercial Plaza. When the girl's father approached to argue, he was beaten by several people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 15, a blogger posted a video saying that he was fired from his company Jiyue Automobile after buying a Xiaomi SU7 for violating the non-compete agreement and without receiving any compensation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As of April 16, the value of this batch of Bitcoins was approximately RMB 130 million.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 16, Shenzhen, Guangdong. A gold jewelry merchant named "Qianbaiwan Jewelry" in Shuibei Jewelry Trading Market ran away with the payment for goods worth about 400 kilograms of gold. The amount involved was as high as 200 million yuan. It is reported that the reason for running away is related to the recent fluctuations in gold prices.
The video shows that a large number of citizens gathered around the store, and the police handled the situation on the spot.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 16, people went to Baicheng Medical College to offer flowers to mourn the deceased girl, but the flowers were later confiscated by security guards.
Some netizens also bought live fish through the platform and sent them to the school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At present, the family of the deceased said that they have reached a settlement with the school, and the compensation has been deposited into the account, and they hope that the media will not intervene.
The school said that the so-called deceased girl was targeted by the counselor for the gift-giving issue was untrue, and the school rescued her in time, which was inconsistent with the information circulated on the Internet.
The local education department said that the school sent the girl to the hospital as soon as the symptoms were found, which was inconsistent with the exposure on the Internet. Further measures are being taken regarding the issue of the counselor suspected of accepting gifts.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 15, Tonglu, Zhejiang. When a blogger was traveling in the ancient town of Shenao, an old man opened the door of his ancient house for tourists to visit for free. At this time, several tourists came in and "pointed" at the ancient house, saying that the old man made the house ugly and some places should be demolished and rebuilt. After learning that the old man was a family member of a martyr, these people suggested that the old man hand over the house to the state.
The blogger could not listen and refuted, but was taught by the other party that he had low ideological awareness.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: By the way, the faces of all the characters in these wood carvings were cut off as a result of the "Four Olds" campaign during the Cultural Revolution, which was very common in Huizhou area in southern Anhui.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 16, it was revealed online that a student from Shijiazhuang Engineering Vocational College asked for leave due to illness, but the counselor refused to approve it, which eventually led to his death due to untimely treatment. Family members put up banners outside the school gate to protect their rights.
According to the student's girlfriend, her boyfriend had been suffering from a fever for three days, but the counselor refused to approve his leave and threatened him. It was not until March 15 that her boyfriend's roommate discovered his condition and told her, and everyone called the emergency number. "The counselor never showed up during this period, and the teacher on duty only sent an ambulance." During her boyfriend's hospitalization, the school and leaders did not make any calls or visit him in the hospital. "I just want to get 20,000 yuan to settle the matter."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 15, Xingtai, Hebei. A third-grade student at Ningjin Fangda Experimental Primary School died mysteriously in class. The parents complained in the group that the school did not care and would not let them watch the surveillance video.
On that day, the parents held banners outside the school to protest their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the police in Taizhou, Jiangsu Province, uncovered a fake staged case. The suspect Zhang had never worked as a food delivery rider, but used "low wages for riders and platform deductions" as the traffic password, and used "selling misery" to gain network traffic. He has released 87 fake short videos with a total of nearly 5 million views. At present, the police have taken criminal detention measures against Zhang.
The incident has sparked discussion among netizens

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @YesterdayBigcat ❤

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 16, in Nanning, Guangxi, the owners of Xinxiu Jiayuan Community decided to govern themselves, but the community not only disagreed, but also brought property staff to forcibly enter the community, during which the owners and security guards had a dispute and shoveling.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/AU6AkYrXD8

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of April 16, in Zibo, Shandong, Lijin investors continued to defend their rights outside the Zibo Municipal Government.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some discussion on entry and exit restrictions for employees within the system

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 16, Jining City, Shandong Province. The Sunshine City Garden project of the Urban Construction Corporation was left unfinished, and the owners gathered outside the developer with banners to protest their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 16, Dongdaihe New District, Liaoning. When the government relocated and expropriated land, it did not compensate in the form of a lump sum, but instead issued monthly subsidies.
Now the government has defaulted on the subsidies for 22 months, causing the people whose land was expropriated to lose their source of income. On that day, the people blocked the road to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 6, Xi'an, Shaanxi. A four-and-a-half-year-old child suffered from parafoveal fixation. After surgery at the Fourth Hospital of Xi'an, he became blind and only had light perception.
April 15 (released), family members knelt down in the Tang Dynasty City to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 16, Fangchenggang, Guangxi.
The ASEAN Trade Center project has been unfinished for five years. The owners went to the municipal government to defend their rights but were blocked by the police.
The owners sang "Unity is Strength" and said, "Our money will not be wasted. This will be resolved sooner or later under the leadership of the Communist Party in a socialist country."
